document_name: Effective Control and Monitoring of Percursor Chemicals in Trinidad and Tobago project document.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/TTO/00058357/Effective Control and Monitoring of Percursor Chemicals in Trinidad and Tobago project document.pdf

outputs.output_descr: To establish a common project management platform for the effective implementation of procedures to  manage and monitor the use of precursor chemicals

project_descr:
Expected Outputs:
1. Bill to monitor and control precursor chemicals
2. Establishment of the Precursor Chemical Unit and all its functions
3.  Policy recommendations developed through capacity development in Complex systems
project_title: Effective Control and Monitoring of Precursor Chemicals
